thread.title: What is trending with consumers for ocean and river cruises?
thread.title_full: What is trending with consumers for ocean and river cruises?

author: eTN Global Editor
title: What is trending with consumers for ocean and river cruises?
text:
What is trending with consumers for ocean and river cruises? Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Sep 08, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
DETROIT, MI – CruiseCompete has released its CruiseTrends report for the month of September 2015. 
The CruiseTrends report for September 2015 is detailed below. 
Most Popular Cruise Lines (Based on the total number of quote requests for each cruise line in the given month) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Carnival Cruise Lines 2. Luxury: Oceania Cruises 3. River: Viking River Cruises 
In second place is Royal Caribbean International for premium/contemporary, Cunard for luxury and American Cruise Lines for river. 
Most Popular Cruise Ships (Based on the total number of quote requests for each ship) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Regal Princess (changed from Norwegian Getaway last month) 2. Luxury: Queen Mary 2 3. River: Viking Aegir (changed from American Eagle last month) 
Next in popularity are Carnival Imagination for premium/contemporary, Oceania Riviera for luxury and Emerald Waterways Ships for river. 
Most Popular Cruise Regions (Based on the total number of quote requests for each region) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Caribbean 2. Luxury: Europe 3. River: Europe 
Next in popularity are North America for premium/contemporary, Mediterranean for luxury and North America for river. 
Most Popular Cruise Departure Ports (Based on the total number of quote requests for each departure port) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Fort Lauderdale, Fla. 2. Luxury: Miami, Fla (changed from New York, N.Y. last month) 3. River: Budapest, Hungary 
Next in popularity are Miami, Fla. for premium/contemporary, New York, N.Y. for luxury and Amsterdam, The Netherlands for river. 
Most Popular Cruise Ports Visited (Based on the total number of quote requests for each port visited during cruise itineraries, excluding departure ports) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Cozumel, Mexico 2. Luxury: Bora Bora, French Polynesia (changed from Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada last month) 3. River: Vienna, Austria 
Next in popularity are Nassau, Bahamas for premium/contemporary, Gustavia, St. Bart’s for luxury and Cologne, Germany for river. 
Most Popular Countries Visited (Based on the total number of quote requests for each country visited during cruise itineraries, excluding countries of departure) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Mexico (changed from Bahamas last month) 2. Luxury: United States (changed from Greece last month) 3. River: Germany 
Second are Bahamas for premium/contemporary, Greece for luxury and Austria for river. 
Most Popular Cabin Types (Based on the total number of quote requests for each cabin type) 
1. Premium/Contemporary: Balcony
